overview:
Steven brings vast auto industry experience from his background with Penske Auto Group, formerly United Auto Group, the second largest publicly traded automotive retailer in the United States. As a key member of Roger Penske’s team, Steven was integral in driving the strategy for improving the F&I (Finance and Insurance) income of U.S. operations, and was responsible for F&I compliance, including the development of ethics policies and compliance review programs. Prior to joining PAG, Steven served as Managing Director and Corporate Officer for G.E. Fleet Services within the United Kingdom where he was responsible for assets of $900 million, annual revenues of $225 million with a workforce of 350.

Steven was born in Sydney, Australia before immigrating to Canada where he grew up living in Calgary, Alberta with his parents and two sisters. As an avid athlete he pursued his passion for sports, especially soccer earning the opportunity to play professionally in Canada and in the U.K. He started his automotive career in the fleet services industry in Vancouver attaining progressive leadership positions with GE Fleet Services in Canada and Internationally.

Steven enjoys open air motoring in his convertible in the summer time and braves Michigan winters in his Hummer H3.
